$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___level.description: Microsoft.Authorization/locks: level - specifies the type of lock to apply to the scope.  CanNotDelete allows modification but prevents deletion, ReadOnly prevents modification or deletion.

___notes.description: Microsoft.Authorization/locks: notes - user defined notes for the lock

___dependsOn.description: Collection of resources this resource depends on
